title: bitmap typeface
content:
Hi

I've been asked to create a logo for a mate, his company sells in-game advertising and is called 'game creative'.

The idea is that the logo represents the essential building blocks of all games i.e. pixels. So I'm looking for a face that has a pixel look or is very square and gridlike.

I tried ff stealth and gridnik but neither seem right for this. Can anyone suggest anything else?

Thanks
author: dendicott
